UI transparency
Example BASIC code

Directions:

Drag a PNG file onto this area, then pan around with the clip area over the 16x16 sprite you want to import into your spritesheet. Make sure to select the correct position in the spritesheet before copying.

Zoom in to get an accurate clip. To shift 1px use shift+cursor keys.
